plot: Class 3E is about to begin their second semester. And while some things have changed, the class assignment is still the same: kill their teacher before the end of the year. Easier said than done since Koro Sensei's made it clear he won't go down without a fight.
opening_theme: "QUESTION" by Mai Fuchigami, Aya Suzaki, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Ryota Ohsaka, & Shintarō Asanuma
"Bye Bye Yesterday" by Mai Fuchigami, Aya Suzaki, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Ryota Ohsaka, & Shintarō Asanuma
ending_theme: "Kaketa Tsuki" (欠けた月; Damaged Moon) by Shion Miyawaki
"Mata Kimi ni Aeru Hi" (The Day When I Can Meet You Again) by Shion Miyawaki
